tests.name: Test that the correct product is added to the cart

steps.name: Given the User is on login page
When the User tries to login with "standard_user" as username and "secret_sauce" as password
Then the User should be on Products page
When the user adds "Sauce Labs Backpack" to the cart
And is on the cart page
Then price of the "Sauce Labs Backpack" in cart must match "$29.99"
And quantity of the "Sauce Labs Backpack" in cart must match 1

tests.suite: chromium > feature/cart.feature.spec.js > Cart

tests.name: Test removal of a product from the cart

steps.name: Given the User is on login page
When the User tries to login with "standard_user" as username and "secret_sauce" as password
Then the User should be on Products page
When the user adds "Sauce Labs Backpack" to the cart
And is on the cart page
Then the user removes "Sauce Labs Backpack" from the cart
Then the item count badge must not be displayed on cart icon in header

tests.suite: chromium > feature/cart.feature.spec.js > Cart

tests.name: Test that clicking on 'Continue Shopping' button takes back to Products page

steps.name: Given the User is on login page
When the User tries to login with "standard_user" as username and "secret_sauce" as password
Then the User should be on Products page
When the user adds "Sauce Labs Backpack" to the cart
And is on the cart page
When the user clicks on the `Continue Shopping` button
Then the User should be on Products page

tests.suite: chromium > feature/cart.feature.spec.js > Cart

tests.name: Test that clicking on `Checkout` button starts checkout

steps.name: Given the User is on login page
When the User tries to login with "standard_user" as username and "secret_sauce" as password
Then the User should be on Products page
When the user adds "Sauce Labs Backpack" to the cart
And is on the cart page
When the user clicks on the `Checkout` button
Then the User should be on Your Information page

tests.suite: chromium > feature/cart.feature.spec.js > Cart

tests.name: Test that the user is able to log out from the cart page

steps.name: Given the User is on login page
When the User tries to login with "standard_user" as username and "secret_sauce" as password
Then the User should be on Products page
When the user adds "Sauce Labs Backpack" to the cart
And is on the cart page
When the user clicks Log out from hamburger menu
Then the user must be logged out

tests.suite: chromium > feature/cart.feature.spec.js > Cart

tests.name: Test that the copyright text in footer is visible

steps.name: Given the User is on login page
When the User tries to login with "standard_user" as username and "secret_sauce" as password
Then the User should be on Products page
When the user adds "Sauce Labs Backpack" to the cart
And is on the cart page
Then copyright text in footer should be visible
And the copyright text contents should be correct

tests.suite: chromium > feature/cart.feature.spec.js > Cart

tests.name: Twitter/X link in footer should work

steps.name: Given the User is on login page
When the User tries to login with "standard_user" as username and "secret_sauce" as password
Then the User should be on Products page
When the user adds "Sauce Labs Backpack" to the cart
And is on the cart page
Then "Twitter/X" link in footer should be visible
When the user clicks "Twitter/X" link from footer, it should open correct "https://x.com/saucelabs" in a new tab

tests.suite: chromium > feature/cart.feature.spec.js > Cart > Test Social Media links in footer

tests.name: Facebook link in footer should work

steps.name: Given the User is on login page
When the User tries to login with "standard_user" as username and "secret_sauce" as password
Then the User should be on Products page
When the user adds "Sauce Labs Backpack" to the cart
And is on the cart page
Then "Facebook" link in footer should be visible
When the user clicks "Facebook" link from footer, it should open correct "https://www.facebook.com/saucelabs" in a new tab

tests.suite: chromium > feature/cart.feature.spec.js > Cart > Test Social Media links in footer

tests.name: LinkedIn link in footer should work

steps.name: Given the User is on login page
When the User tries to login with "standard_user" as username and "secret_sauce" as password

tests.name: Test that a Locked out user is not able to login despite using valid login credentials

steps.name: Given the User is on login page
When the User tries to login with "locked_out_user" as username and "secret_sauce" as password
Then the User should see a locked out error message

tests.suite: chromium > feature/login.feature.spec.js > User Login

tests.name: Test that the user is able to add a product to the cart

When the User tries to login with "standard_user" as username and "secret_sauce" as password
Then the User should be on Products page
When the user adds "Sauce Labs Backpack" to the cart
Then the cart item badge must show correct count of 1

tests.name: Test that the user is able to remove a product from the cart

steps.name: Given the User is on login page
When the User tries to login with "standard_user" as username and "secret_sauce" as password
Then the User should be on Products page
When the user adds "Sauce Labs Bike Light" to the cart
Then the user should be able to remove "Sauce Labs Bike Light" from the cart, using the `Remove` button
Then the cart item badge must not be displayed

tests.suite: chromium > feature/products.feature.spec.js > Products
